meanings.definition: Relating to or consisting of tissue.
meanings.sent1: The tissual examination showed healthy cells.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained the tissual composition of the skin.
meanings.sent3: The tissual bandage looked like a tiny quilt.
meanings.sent4: Her tissual knowledge weaved through the medical field.
meanings.sent5: The tissual texture felt smooth and delicate.

meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or involving the arrangement or structure of tissues.
meanings.sent1: The tissual pattern of the fabric resembled cells.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the tissual organization of the organs.
meanings.sent3: The tissual puzzle was challenging to put together.
meanings.sent4: His tissual design of the building was intricate.
meanings.sent5: The tissual layout of the garden was aesthetically pleasing.

meanings.definition: Characterized by or pertaining to the organization of tissues.
meanings.sent1: The tissual structure of the plant was fascinating.
meanings.sent2: The researcher focused on the tissual arrangement of cells.
meanings.sent3: The tissual party decorations were colorful and fun.
